name: Blossom Island
description:
Welcome to Blossom Island! This is the demo for my wholesome upcoming  life-simulation game

Take a deep breath and begin your cozy new life. You get an awesome plot of land all of your own! Make of it what you want.

  • Gather, Craft Build
  • Do some landscaping
  • Grow seeds
  • Cook
  • Raise animals
  • Make friends
  • And more!
Get to know the lovely Blossoms, the cute creatures that inhabit the island. Raise them, train them, breed them and enter them in competitions.We hope to see you soon on Blossom Island!

Note: This is a very early version, expect lots of bugs and unpolished elements, and not a ton of content. I just wanted to show-off the game and see what you guys think!

Warning: The save system is not fully functional
